channel.title: LWC locks
channel.description:
I'd like to have a revote on the amount of LWC locks that people can have, considering pretty much all of you are against stealing I think it would be a good idea to have more/unlimited LWC locks.
Currently it's five.
Vote and post your reasoning, if you don't post the reason your vote won't be counted.

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Wouldn’t it be better if you could just renew your “lease” with a command?

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

agree, with the exception that if chests are used to purposefully annoy others that it maybe allowed to be removed immediatly.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

agree, although 15 sounds too much lol

Read full topic

agree

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff

item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:33, topic:430047”]Ok, how about I increase the maximum chests to 15 (does anyone need more?) and expire all locks that haven’t been accessed within 3 weeks?

Agree or disagree?[/quote]
Agree

Read full topic

Ok, how about I increase the maximum chests to 15 (does anyone need more?) and expire all locks that haven’t been accessed within 3 weeks?

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Maybe if no activity (Opening) by the owner for 2-3 weeks? I mean…it’s a chest. If you play, you’re gonna use it more than likely.

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

How often should locks be expired?

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I did discover that LWC recently does allow you to ‘expire’ locks that haven’t been used in X number of days, so perhaps that’s something we should do as well?

Please.

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I like the idea of the locked chests expiring because of people who quit or get banned and their chests become in the way.

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The main purpose of this thread was that it was brought up that ‘stealing should be against the rules’, and if that is true, we should just allow more or unlimited LWC locks.

I did discover that LWC recently does allow you to ‘expire’ locks that haven’t been used in X number of days, so perhaps that’s something we should do as well?

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @deathwilldie0 deathwilldie0
item.description:
@deathwilldie0 wrote:

I think 5 chests is just enough. I’ve only used 3 locked chests so far and I actually can’t find a use for more than 3. What you can also do is share locked chests with people you trust. Generally moose and I share our locked chests and we both share each others items all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: LWC locks
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:25, topic:430047”][quote author=mironic link=topic=532728.msg3895713#msg3895713 date=1327274748]

[quote author=badger41 link=topic=532728.msg3895707#msg3895707 date=1327274581]

just turn it to 1.0.1…

STICK TO THE TOPIC.
updating to 1.0.1 wont help us solve ANYTHING about the chests.

i vote no more then 10, it also leaves less chances for someone to leave a chest out in the middle of nowhere. if unlimited, someone can just leave a chest where ever the fuck they want(right in your way), and you cant do anything about it. its harder to do that when you only can lock 5 chests, because most people use all 5 locks.

yush it will… it makes them sexier.
[/quote]iirc chests were already updated in 1.8

yush, but they were not fix’t till 1.0.1 theres a dup bug in the 1.8 - 1.9 ones.

shut up and stop trolling

trolling? im not… chest 1.8 and 1.9 if lag exists on SMP, you can dup the item that is lagging.

<,< it was not fix’t till the full release…

its too bad that your argument is invalid because moparcraft hasnt even had an issue with that
[/quote]yes it has, i ran into it twice yesterday… luckily it duplicated dirt… World 1 of course.
W2 seems to be alot less laggy.

im going to call your bluff on this one. i have been playing at least 5 hours every day for the past month, and did the same on w1 a month before, and never came across this “dupe glitch”. either way, world1 is shit because of xrayers anyways, duped items will not hurt the server being they cant be taken to world 2. so your argument is still invalid.

maybe you came across it because you were trying to come across it? because it doesnt happen to the normal player[/quote]

i did not look for it… or else i would have dup’d more then dirt. lol…

and its not like you can time the servers lag spikes.

Read full topic

im going to call your bluff on this one. i have been playing at least 5 hours every day for the past month, and did the same on w1 a month before, and never came across this “dupe glitch”. either way, world1 is shit because of xrayers anyways, duped items will not hurt the server being they cant be taken to world 2. so your argument is still invalid.

maybe you came across it because you were trying to come across it? because it doesnt happen to the normal player
